public abstract class OurCheckbox
extends javax.swing.JPanel

Graphical checkbox.

Thread Safety: Can be called only by the AWT event thread.

Constructor Detail

OurCheckbox

public OurCheckbox(java.lang.String label,
                   java.lang.String tooltip,
                   javax.swing.Icon icon)
Constructs a OurCheckbox object.

Parameters:
label - - the label to display next to the checkbox
tooltip - - the tool tip to show when the mouse hovers over this checkbox
icon - - the initial icon to display (should be one of ON/OFF/ALL_ON/ALL_OFF/INH_ON/INH_OFF)
